newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: San Jose Oil changes name.
newsitem.headline: San Jose Oil changes name.

text.p: The board of Philippine oil exploration company San Jose Oil said on Monday its newly elected board has approved a name change to Fil-Estate Corporation.

In a disclosure to the Philippine Stock Exchange, the company said the board had also approved the subscription of Fil-Estate Management Inc, the parent company of Fil-Estate Land, to 700 million pesos worth of San Jose Oil shares in exchange for assets.
Company officials said the deal, which was concluded in November, gave Fil-Estate Management a 70 percent stake in San Jose Oil.
One of the assets is Fil-Estate Management's 23 percent interest in Metro Rail Transit Corp, operator of the country's third light rail transit.
San Jose Oil earlier said the oil exploration firm would be converted into a holding company.
